COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3536/89  of 27 November 1989  on the supply of various consignments of cereals to Sri Lanka as food aid
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: A tendering procedure is hereby initiated for the award of a contract for the supply of cereals to Sri Lanka in accordance with the provisions of Regulation (EEC) No 2200/87 and with the conditions laid down in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 November 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
